greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1; a(2*n) = 7*a(n), a(2*n+1) = a(n) + a(n+1).
mathematica: nmax = 52; CoefficientList[Series[x Product[(1 + 7 x^(2^k) + x^(2^(k + 1))), {k, 0, Floor[Log[2, nmax]] + 1}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 16 2021
